Uses of Class
eapli.framework.persistence.DataIntegrityViolationException

  • Packages that use DataIntegrityViolationException 
    Package Description
    eapli.framework.domain.ddd  
    eapli.framework.persistence.repositories
    Provides generic interfaces for building persistence layers following the Repository pattern (acts as an in memory collection of entities).
    eapli.framework.persistence.repositories.impl.jpa
    Provides a generic base class for implementing repositories using JPA. this class is compatible with the Repository interface defined in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories

    • Uses of DataIntegrityViolationException in eapli.framework.domain.ddd

      Methods in eapli.framework.domain.ddd that throw DataIntegrityViolationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Repository.add(T entity)
      adds a new entity to the repository. if the entity already exists it will throw an exception. formally, the exception will be throw if there is already an entity with the same business identity.
      void DeleteableRepository.remove(I entityId)
      Removes the entity with the specified primary key from the repository.
      void DeleteableRepository.remove(T entity)
      removes the specified entity from the repository.

    • Uses of DataIntegrityViolationException in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories

      Methods in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories that throw DataIntegrityViolationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DataRepository.delete(K entityId)
      Removes the entity with the specified primary key from the repository.
      void DataRepository.delete(T entity)
      removes the specified entity from the repository.
      T DataRepository.save(T entity)
      Saves an entity either by creating it or updating it in the persistence store.

    • Uses of DataIntegrityViolationException in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories.impl.jpa

      Methods in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories.impl.jpa that throw DataIntegrityViolationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T JpaBaseRepository.create(T entity)
      adds a new entity to the persistence store
      T JpaTransactionalRepository.create(T entity)
      adds and commits a new entity to the persistence store
      void JpaBaseRepository.delete(K entityId)
      Removes the entity with the specified ID from the repository.
      void JpaTransactionalRepository.delete(K entityId)
      Removes the entity with the specified ID from the repository.
      void JpaAutoTxRepository.delete(K id) 
      void JpaBaseRepository.delete(T entity)
      removes the object from the persistence storage. the object reference is still valid but the persisted entity is marked as deleted in the entity manager
      void JpaTransactionalRepository.delete(T entity)
      removes the object from the persistence storage. the object reference is still valid but the persisted entity is/will be deleted
      void JpaAutoTxRepository.delete(T entity) 
      T JpaBaseRepository.save(T entity)
      Inserts or updates an entity and commits.
      T JpaTransactionalRepository.save(T entity)
      Inserts or updates an entity and commits.
      T JpaAutoTxRepository.save(T entity) 
      T JpaBaseRepository.update(T entity)
